name: vl-ui-pager
description: Gebruik de pager component om het aantal beschikbare pagina's weer te geven, markeer de huidige pagina en voeg navigatie knoppen toe.
author: DIDM

scripts.prepare: npm update --dev vl-ui-util && npm run prepare:util
scripts.prepare:util: npm explore vl-ui-util -- npm run util
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:server:start && npm run test:e2e:chrome && npm run test:e2e:firefox
scripts.test:e2e:grid: npm run test:server:start && npm run test:e2e:chrome:grid && npm run test:e2e:firefox:grid
scripts.release:prepare: npm run release:prepare:build && npm run release:prepare:commit
scripts.release:prepare:build: npm run release:prepare:build:es6 && npm run release:prepare:build:es6:min && npm run release:prepare:build:node
scripts.release:prepare:build:es6: npm run release:prepare:build:es6:copy && npm run release:prepare:build:es6:replace
scripts.release:prepare:build:es6:min: npm run release:prepare:build:es6:min:copy && npm run release:prepare:build:es6:min:explode && npm run release:prepare:build:es6:min:minify
scripts.release:prepare:build:es6:min:explode: npm explore vl-ui-util -- npm run explode -- --fileName=vl-pager.tmp.min.js
scripts.release:prepare:build:node: npm run release:prepare:build:node:copy && npm run release:prepare:build:node:replace && npm run release:prepare:build:node:explode
scripts.release:prepare:build:node:replace: npm run release:prepare:build:node:replace:src && npm run release:prepare:build:node:replace:dist
scripts.release:prepare:build:node:explode: npm explore vl-ui-util -- npm run explode -- --fileName=vl-pager.src.js
scripts.release:prepare:commit: git add -f . && git commit --amend --no-edit && git pull
